         You and Jill rolled on the ground making love and in the middle of it you said, "Hanna and her niece will savor every bite of the sweet and juicy mixture that we will add to that pie." After having filled the pie crust with chopped and smashed strawberries and cherries, Hanna came over and saw you and Jill making love, "Oh my you two, with loving like that this lovers pie is going to be great." She then picked up you and Jill in one hand and transfered the two of you to the gooey fruit filled pie and licked the sticky white remnants from her hand, "That special ingredient will make this pie taste even better. You and Jill knew there was no escape so the two of you played around and covered each other in the fruity filling, then made more love while Hanna placed a thick dough over top. With a fork, Hanna poked a few holes for the heat to vent out from the pie for when it was in the oven. That was next of course, Hanna spoke her warning, "Okay, it is time for you two to become backed in goodness." You heard the oven door open and the pie being slid in. The oven had been preheated and you and Jill shuddered from feeling the heat. After about a half hour, the heat became unbearable and in one final loving embrace, Jill said, "I love you so much, I am grateful that you are baking alongside me in the end." You kissed her and told her that you thought the same. Finally, the two of you passed out at the same time and continued to bake.
133111.title: The Making Of A Lovers Pie.

1331111.content:
Sarah walked into her Aunt Hanna's apartment and smelled a sweet and delicious scent. She sat at the table and Hanna put a salad in front of her. The pie sat in the middle of the table. Sarah spoke, "The pie smells great can't I have a piece now?" Hanna said, "It has to cool first, eat the salad first." Sarah quickly finished her salad, "I thought you said that we were going to have Jack and Jill over for dinner? Oh, and what is in the pie?" Hanna answered after slicing up the pie and giving a slice form each side to Sarah, "Here you go, Jack and Jill are right here and were having them for dinner, they help me create lovers pie, so eat up." Hanna got herself a piece from each side as well, as Sarah stared at her plate wide-eyed. "Come on," Hanna urged having already finished one slice, "I gave you the two pieces that contained their lower halves, that will be the best parts."
         Sarah ate an savored the piece that contained your bottom half and sexily licked her fork clean, "Mmm, I always told Jack that he was really sweet. I was right." She then began on the Jill slice and she eagerly made her first bite contained all Jill's plump rump. It was a big bite and Sarah took a good minute to chew and savor. Sarah swallowed and smiled mischievously, "Hanna, didn't I always tell you that the reason Jack was with Jill was because of her ass; well he made a good choice, if he hadn't, I wouldn't have gotten to eat that scrumptious plump and juicy ass." Hanna nodded and let out a little burp, "Mmm, Jill's breasts were scrumptious as well." Hanna and Sarah shared and finish the whole, then sat on the couch together, rubbing their sexy full bellies, and moaning with pleasure. Hanna turned to Sarah, "Hey, didn't you say that you didn't like your friend Brittney anymore." "Ya, she took my boyfriend from me," Sarah replied and then smiled and giggled, "What do you have in mind." Hanna grinned, "Invite her over here for dinner tomorrow, say that you want to make up. When she comes over I'll shrink her to twenty inches and introduce the plump girl to my large rotisserie oven."
1331111.title: Jack And Jill Make Great Pie.

This is bad because you and Jill live at the entrance to your hall you get a lot of traffic going past your door. Feeling a draft you look down and discover that you are completely naked. Not knowing what else to do you move to your door, and after seeing that you can not crawl under it you start to bang on it. After a couple of minutes of banging on the giant door the only thing you accomplish is a couple of sour hands. Suddenly the ground starts to shakes as some one starts climbing the stairs that will lead them too this floor, you know it has to be this floor for you and Jill wanted to live on the top floor because of the beautiful view. As you hold yourself close to the door to get balanced you see the top of someones head come into view after a while you see that...

14.content:
You are 28 years old and are married to Jill, who had been your long time girlfriend. She is 5ft 5in tall with long brown hair, nice C-cup breast, lovely legs with nice thick thighs attached to a wonderfully rounded ass. She's not thin but not fat, an all around sexy lady. When you were 23, you had won 20 million dollars in the lottery, a couple years later you married Jill and bought a small retail store in your area and turned it into a large chain of stores. You now have a company office building and a large office for yourself to do company work, and you also have a young sexy redheaded secretary named Gina. You also had many female employees in your office building who would stop by to turn in paperwork. You had shrunk in the office where you worked and it was lunch time. Now there came a knock at the door and it started to open. There are many people that could have come to your office at this time.

Who walked in the door?
14.title: You Are A Shrunken Company President.

info.description:
Your name is Jack Tall. You were just an ordinary guy that was living his life when the unexpected happened, you shrunk to three inches. Who knows how it happened. You decide it is best to seek the help of a girls or women, thinking that they would be the type that would help a shrunken now naked guy. Maybe they would think you are cute in your shrunken form and find a way to help a poor little guy. You hope the female that you try to get help from is nice because you are very vulnerable.

I'll give 50 gift points for every edition I deem excellent. If you make an edition but don't want the points e-mail me that you don't want them.

Rules:

1.) No guys besides Jack, so no gay stuff.
2.) No animals, reptiles, bugs, insects, etc. etc.::: Only human female interaction.
3.) You can add new female characters, but the age limits are from between 16 to 35 years old.
4.) Do not change the names of characters; keep the name that was originally given by the character creator.
5.) Possible ways you could have been shrunk: Drug in food or drink, female that had the power to shrink you, shrink gun, or the cause can just be unknown. If it is shrink gun, it can be used to resize you, but only in the height range of 2 inches to 20 inches. But you are originally to start out shrunken at 3 inches.
6.) Jack “you”, can be killed, I think stories where people can’t be killed, are stupid. Invulnerability if it is there, can be overcome. Possible ways to be killed are; eaten, digested, cooked, sat on, or in between a female’s legs.
7.) All editions are to be written in the second person perspective, meaning... (You did this. Or…. You slid down into her pants.
8.) Editions must be at least seven sentences long, unless they are transition chapters that say something like, (These are your choices.)
9.) Editions must be written properly with correct spelling and sentence structure. If you have problems with that, use a word processor to correct you. Write as if you were writing a book to be published not an Instant Messenger message.
10.) Have fun.

Will delete editions that don't follow the rules.
